_header: With all mine Whole Heart entire
_description: A parody of the mass (the ‘Venus Mass’ perhaps by Lydgate), a series of love lyrics in varying forms for Introibo, Confiteor, Misereatur, Officium, Kyrie, Gloria, and Oryson — 145 lines in all

BodFair16.First Lines:
Wyth all myn hool herte entereTo fore the famous Riche
                    Autere…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…And make ther Ioye to ReneweSwich as wyl neuer be
                    chaungable
BodFair16.Note:
With headings for the various parts of the mass, e.g.,
                        ‘Introito’ and later ‘Confiteor’ on f.
                    314; continues with ‘The Epystel in prose’ on ff.
                        316v-317v.
